item.title: Never Let Me Down Again
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.md#when-the-dogs-do-find-her-vyl-wnanory|I’m taking a ride with my best friend]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.md#when-the-dogs-do-find-her-vyl-wnanory|I hope he never lets me down again]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.md#when-the-dogs-do-find-her-vyl-wnanory|He knows where he’s taking me]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/core/plush.
